Name: Koi Yellow
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Sherbet raspberry Martini with a sweet and citrus sour finish.
History: The signature drink at Koi Restaurant, Los Angeles, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Koi Yellow contains 222 calories
